name: Masked Janitor
description:
Masked Janitor is a pretty small game about a janitor, going through haunted mansion, armed only with his broom stick, which he can use to fight and broom jump™, along the way you will find diffrent mask with magic power and uncover the masked truth about them. 

This game was created for 🎃 Spooktober Jam 🎃 

theme for which was "Mask the truth"

Controls:

Move: A,D / Left,Right

Jump: Space Bar

Aim: Use Mouse

Attack / Broom Jump™: LMB

Switch Masks: Number Keys
